Author: Pink_salts
Text: Yep, artificial sugars spike insulin so it just made me *hungry all the time.* Also, I knew people irl who were skinny but they subsisted on candy and energy drinks (full sugared versions). She was thirty but had a body of a skinny pubescent teenager. Some people are fine or they’re just really good at suppressing their hunger cues but then you hear about people going on awful binges when they don’t get their Diet Coke fix but then are fine again once they start drinking it’s kind of like huh? ya know. Whatever works for people tho, as long as they know their body and don’t do it cuz ~*everyone else in the ED community is doing it.*~ Everyone has their vices, whether that’s caffeine, sugar, artificial sweeteners, nicotine, etc. and we all know it’s bad for us but it’s good to know the possible irreversible health consequences of it so no one gets blindsided.
